GK16mamkavpu:4534: tathā grīṣmadivasaśriyo 'pi pratināyikātvena bhaviṣyatīti kiṃ dayitayeti svaśabdopādānena //
GK16mamkavpu:4535: śleṣopamāyāstu sa viṣayaḥ yatropamānasyopādānamantareṇa sādhāraṇeṣvapi viśeṣaṇeṣu na tathā pratītiḥ / yathā
GK16mamkavpu:4539: aprastutapraśaṃsāyāmapi upameyam anayaiva rītyā pratītaṃ na punaḥ prayogeṇa kadarthatāṃ neyam / yathā
GK16mamkavpu:4542: khadyoto 'pi na kampate pracalituṃ madhye 'pi tejasvināṃ
GK16mamkavpu:4545: atra acetanasya prabhoraprastutaviśiṣṭasāmānyadvāreṇābhivyaktau na yuktameva punaḥ kathanam //
GK16mamkavpu:4546: tadeta alaṅkāradoṣāḥ yathāsaṃbhāvinonye 'pyevañjātīyakāḥ pūrvoktayaiva doṣajātyā antarbhāvitāḥ na pṛthag pratipādanamarhantīti saṃpūrṇamidaṃ kāvyalakṣaṇam //142//
GK16mamkavpu:4548: na tadvicitraṃ yadamutra samyagvinirmitā saṃghaṭanaiva hetuḥ //1//}
